# Pi Info Website Project Instructions

This is a real-time Raspberry Pi resource monitoring website project with the following components:

## Architecture
- Python Flask backend for system monitoring APIs
- HTML/CSS/JavaScript frontend with real-time dashboard
- WebSocket or AJAX polling for live data updates
- Responsive design for mobile and desktop access

## Key Features
- Real-time CPU usage monitoring
- Memory usage tracking
- Temperature monitoring (Raspberry Pi specific)
- Storage/disk usage information
- Network statistics
- System uptime
- Beautiful, modern UI with charts and graphs

## Tech Stack
- Backend: Python with Flask, psutil for system monitoring
- Frontend: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (vanilla or with Chart.js)
- Real-time updates: WebSocket or AJAX polling
- Styling: Modern CSS with responsive design

## Development Guidelines
- Follow PEP 8 for Python code
- Use semantic HTML and accessible CSS
- Implement proper error handling
- Add appropriate security headers
- Ensure mobile responsiveness
